name: Justice League Season 2
info:
• 中文名: 正义联盟 第二季
  • 话数: 26
  • 放送开始: 2003年7月5日
  • 原作: DC Comics
  • 制片人: Bruce Timm
  • 动画制作: Warner Bros. Animation

eps.name: Twilight
eps.desc: Darkseid convinces the League to help him fight Brainiac from destroying his planet of Apokolips.

eps.name: Twilight: Part II
eps.desc: Trapped in Brainiac's headquarters, a temperamental Superman discovers that the metal monstrosity has made a deal with Darkseid, whose own son Orion engages him in battle.

eps.name: Tabula Rasa
eps.desc: Lex Luthor finds an extremely advanced android that can imitate superpowers and manipulates it to attack the Justice League.

eps.name: Tabula Rasa: Part II
eps.desc: Android Amazo has absorbed most of the League's powers, but begins to question Luthor's true motivations. Meanwhile, Batman reveals he has a contingency plan for Superman going AWOL: Kryptonite.

eps.name: Only a Dream
eps.desc: A man becomes a supervillain who attacks his victims in their dreams.

eps.name: Only a Dream: Part II
eps.desc: With the other members of the Justice League trapped in their worst nightmares, Batman and Martian Manhunter have to defeat Doctor Destiny and save them before it is too late.

eps.name: Maid of Honor
eps.desc: Diana makes friends with a flighty princess only to discover her fiancé is the immortal supervillain Vandal Savage.

eps.name: Maid of Honor: Part II
eps.desc: The Justice League works to thwart Vandal Savage's plan to blackmail the nations of the world with an orbiting railgun.

eps.name: Hearts and Minds
eps.desc: After learning of his mentor Katama's fall in battle, the Green Lantern travels to a world at the edge of the galaxy to investigate.

eps.name: Hearts and Minds: Part II
eps.desc: Joined by Hawkgirl, Martian Manhunter, and the Flash, the Green Lantern and Katma face the fanatic cult leader Despero in an effort to stop his plans to conquer the galaxy.

eps.name: A Better World
eps.desc: In an alternate reality, a version of the Justice League known as the Justice Lords discovers the League's world and plot to take it over.

eps.name: A Better World: Part II
eps.desc: With the Justice League out of the way, the Justice Lords begin to establish their own style of order.

eps.name: Eclipsed
eps.desc: Released by a soldier, an evil entity takes control of various people and threatens the world.

eps.name: Eclipsed: Part II
eps.desc: With the other members of the Justice League possessed by the entities, the Flash must find a way of stopping them from carrying out their plan to exterminate humanity.

eps.name: The Terror Beyond
eps.desc: Solomon Grundy attacks a harbor. After the military has him contained, Aquaman arrives and steals Grundy. When the League finds out Aquaman is involved, they head to Dr. Fate to get some answers.

eps.name: The Terror Beyond: Part II
eps.desc: Fate and Aquaman wanted to sacrifice Grundy to prevent the return of a mystic being. The being has arrived; Aquaman leaves to protect Atlantis. Hawkgirl finds out the being had visited her homeworld long ago.

eps.name: Secret Society
eps.desc: While the Justice League is experiencing serious internal friction, Gorilla Grodd carefully assembles a well organized supervillain team to attack it.

eps.name: Secret Society: Part II
eps.desc: With the Justice League disbanded, its former members are targeted by the super-villains of the Secret Society.

eps.name: Hereafter
eps.desc: During a battle with the Revenge Squad, Superman apparently falls in battle.

eps.name: Hereafter: Part II
eps.desc: Superman has been transported into the distant future. With no powers, he must find a way to get back to the present, he finds an unexpected ally in Vandal Savage, the Earth's lone human survivor. Meanwhile in the present, Lobo joins the League, as Superman's replacement.

eps.name: Wild Cards
eps.desc: The Joker creates havoc in Las Vegas with his Royal Flush Gang.

eps.name: Wild Cards: Part II
eps.desc: The Joker's real plan becomes apparent when he unleashes Ace upon the Justice League.

eps.name: Comfort and Joy
eps.desc: Members of the Justice League celebrate Christmas.

eps.name: Starcrossed
eps.desc: Hawkgirl's people, the Thanagarians, arrive to offer the planet protection from another alien race threatening to invade Earth.

eps.name: Starcrossed: Part II
eps.desc: With Earth now under Thanagarian control, the Justice League goes into hiding to recover and cope with the betrayal of one of their own.

eps.name: Starcrossed: Part III
eps.desc: The Justice League launch an assault on the Thanagarians before the activation of a hyperspace gate that will destroy Earth.
